message_text:
Run /setbot then /listbots to select DeepPavlov config you wish to chat.
To start conversation run /begin.
To end conversation run /end.

Hello! iPavlov Fabulous Bot salutes you!

Run /setbot then /listbots to select DeepPavlov config you wish to chat.
To start conversation run /begin.
To end conversation run /end.

Please note, that it will take a bit of time from some bots to answer you. Be patient.
Cannot start a new conversation. Please finish your current dialog first. Use /help command for usage instructions.
Searching for peer. Please wait...
Partner found!
This is your profile. During the dialog pretend to be this person:
Dialog is finished. Thank you for participation!
Your conversation secret id: {}
No peers found. Try again later.
You are banned from using the system.
INTERNAL_ERROR
Unexpected message. You are not in a dialog yet or the dialog has already been finished. Use /help command for usage instructions.
You're not in a dialog now.
Evaluation is not allowed at the moment. Use /help command for usage instructions.
Please evaluate the whole dialog using one of the buttons below:
Evaluation saved. Waiting for your partner to finish evaluation...

Evaluation saved. Your conversation secret id: {}

Waiting for your partner to finish evaluation...
Select a profile which, in your opinion, belongs to your partner:
Partner profile choosing is not allowed at the moment. Use /help command for usage instructions.
Which one of these sentences describes your partner better ({}/{})?
You are not in a dialog. Complaining is not available.
Your complaint has been recorded and will be examined by the system administrator. Note that your conversation is still active. You can always use /end command to end it.
Could not save your complaint. Have the dialog even started? You cannot complain when there is no messages in a dialog.
You are in a dialog. Bot setting is not available. Please finish it and retry bot setting.

Your default bot is: {}

Enter bot token to set default bot or:
/unsetbot command to unset default bot for your user in this channel
/listbots command to list all active bots
/cancelsetbot command to cancel bot setting
Bot setting is not allowed.
Default bot for your user in this channel was unset.
You are not in bot setting mode now. Please run /setbot command.
You successfully set bot: {}
No bot found with token: {}
Bot setting was canceled.
